hero.title: Never miss important recurring tasks again
hero.subtitle: Recurro is the elegant solution for managing all those tasks that happen regularly but are easy to forget.
hero.description: From watering plants and giving flea medicine to your dog to car maintenance and cleaning your kettle or oven, Recurro keeps you organized and on track with smart notifications and beautiful, intuitive design.

intervalTracking.title: True Interval-Based Tracking
intervalTracking.description: Unlike calendar apps, tasks reset from your completion date, not fixed schedules. Changed your air filter today? Recurro knows exactly when it's due again based on YOUR timing.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.description: Get gentle reminders when tasks are due. Never forget important maintenance again with customizable notification settings.

visualStatus.title: Visual Status System
visualStatus.description: See at a glance what's overdue, due today, or coming up. Color-coded categories and clear status indicators keep you organized.

completionHistory.title: Completion History
completionHistory.description: Track when tasks were completed and add notes. See patterns over time and never wonder "when did I last do this?"

nativeDesign.title: Clean, Native Design
nativeDesign.description: Built with modern design principles for a smooth, intuitive experience that feels right at home on your device.

focusedPurpose.title: Focused Purpose
focusedPurpose.description: Built specifically for recurring maintenance tasks, not daily habits or project management

flexibleIntervals.title: Flexible Intervals
flexibleIntervals.description: Set tasks for days, weeks, months, or custom periods

noSubscription.title: No Subscription Required
